messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] PBS math videos
messages.msgSnippet: Kim, What were these videos called? Mathline Searchable Videos? (These seem to be a computerized video clip.) Can you help me out here? Thanks. KIDS4GOD
messages.messageBody:
Kim,
What were these videos called?
Mathline Searchable Videos? (These seem to be a computerized video clip.)
Can you help me out here?
Thanks.

KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
Jolene Goens
"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14

> BlankHi Carol,
> I got them from PBS, they were free. I don't know if they still
> have them available, but you can check by going to www.pbs.org
> Good luck :)
> Kim
> EDT
> From: sognokids@...
> Subject: Re: Sesame street-LisaKK
>

> I started watching the math videos that I got from PBS

> she came

> lessons

>

> Carol
